dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] using my image without my permission]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, June 24, 2005 12:44 PM
To: wrusso@shopnbc.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] using my image without my permission]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] using my image without my permission
Date: Thu, 23 Jun 2005 12:38:20 -0500
From: Wendi Russo <wrusso@shopnbc.com>
To: <abuse@servermatrix.com>

        Hi!  One of the sites you manage is using images of me that are not
owned by them and have been used for wallpapers without my permission.
Please let me know who I should contact at your firm about this.

Sincerely,


Wendi Winburn


- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCvEZIvK/XpJs6oyURAongAJ93WUc8xZavBxZEvxaGuNZxbbzDwACeJMQj
8Z91nc7dmRFZ+lHYmBGA07c=
=rOsH
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
